name: PUT_Update_Email_Template
description:
Updates an email template.

**Note**: This operation is only applicable to email templates for custom events.

Authorization.description:
`Bearer {token}` for a valid OAuth token.

Note that you must regenerate the OAuth token after the Custom Events feature is enabled in your Zuora tenant. The OAuth tokens generated before this feature is turned on will not work.

Zuora-Track-Id.description:
A custom identifier for tracing the API call. If you set a value for this header, Zuora returns the same value in the response headers. This header enables you to associate your system process identifiers with Zuora API calls, to assist with troubleshooting in the event of an issue.

The value of this field must use the US-ASCII character set and must not include any of the following characters: colon (`:`), semicolon (`;`), double quote (`"`), and quote (`'`).

Zuora-Entity-Ids.description: An entity ID. If you have [Zuora Multi-entity](https://knowledgecenter.zuora.com/BB_Introducing_Z_Business/Multi-entity) enabled and the OAuth token is valid for more than one entity, you must use this header to specify which entity to perform the operation in. If the OAuth token is only valid for a single entity, or you do not have Zuora Multi-entity enabled, you do not need to set this header.

id.description: The ID of the email template to be updated.

$ul: **active**: The status of the email template.
**bccEmailAddress**: Email BCC address.
**ccEmailAddress**: Email CC address.
**ccEmailType**: Email cc type. (default: SpecificEmails)
**createdBy**: The ID of the user who created the notification definition.
**createdOn**: The time when the notification definition was created. Specified in the UTC timezone in the ISO860 format (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD). E.g. 1997-07-16T19:20:30.45+00:00
**description**: The description of the email template.
**emailBody**: The email body. You can add merge fields in the email object using angle brackets.
**emailSubject**: The email subject. You can add merge fields in the email subject using angle brackets.
**encodingType**: The endcode type of the email body.
**eventTypeName**: The name of the event type.
**eventTypeNamespace**: The namespace of the `eventTypeName` field.
**fromEmailAddress**: If formEmailType is SpecificEmail, this field is required.
**fromEmailType**: The from email type.
**fromName**: The name of email sender.
**id**: The filter rule associated with this notification definition.
**isHtml**: Specified whether the style of email body is HTML.
**name**: The name of the email template.
**replyToEmailAddress**: If replyToEmailType is SpecificEmail, this field is required
**replyToEmailType**: The reply email type.
**toEmailAddress**: If toEmailType is SpecificEmail, this field is required.
**toEmailType**: Email receive type.
**updatedBy**: The ID of the user who updated the notification definition.
**updatedOn**: The time when the notification definition was updated. Specified in the UTC timezone in the ISO860 format (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD). E.g. 1997-07-16T19:20:30.45+00:00
